citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:20 am on
Tuesday May 17, 2022. Reached licensee in person but he was headed out to a previously scheduled appointment.
End Section

narrative:

Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
